title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Keynote with Peter DeSantis and Dave Brown
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Peter DeSantis 和 Dave Brown 主题演讲
abstract: Join AWS SVP Peter DeSantis and Dave Brown, Vice President of Compute and Machine Learning Services as they dive deep into the technology that powers AWS services. Get a closer look at how our unique approach and culture of innovation help create leading-edge solutions, from silicon to services.
abstract_cn: 加入AWS高级副总裁Peter DeSantis和计算与机器学习服务副总裁Dave Brown，深入探讨为AWS服务提供支持的技术。近距离了解我们独特的方法和创新文化如何帮助创建领先的解决方案，从芯片到服务。
